system.requirements:
Tier 2: Untouchable E.Adv, Willpower 40
Aptitudes: Defence, Willpower
system.effect: Creatures with the Warp Instability Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable suffer penalties to their Warp Instability Tests equal to 5 x Character's Willpower Bonus.

description.value: Creatures with the Warp Instability Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable suffer penalties to their Warp Instability Tests equal to 5 x Character's Willpower Bonus.
